Supported since _4.0_ according to https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=845607

You can move the file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/pulse_

Supported since _4.0_ according to https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=845607

You can move this file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/pulse/cookie_

Generated by the _module-esound-protocol-unix.so_ module, which is generally not needed.

You can comment it out in _/etc/pulse/default.pa_ or _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/pulse/default.pa_.
